channel.title: About on Wails
channel.description: Recent content in About on Wails

item.title: Concepts
item.description: Wails has been designed to be make the gap between web technologies and Go as minimal as possible. The frontend is a Webview component, and you may develop your frontend code using any common Javascript framework you like, and seemlessly interact with your Go code from it. This is done through a shared IPC mechanism. IPC Overview The IPC mechanism operates across 2 runtimes - one in Javascript and the other in Go.
